text:
Sunny,

Can you please describe the bug in more detail?

creator: zhangsunny77@hotmail.com
text:
I find that log.debug() method cannot work utill the SMTPAppender has done the 
email sending. So, if the email sending of SMTPAppender cannot complete for any 
reason, my System be paused.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
Thanks for this explanation. How long does the system stay blocked? Isn't there 
a timeout?

creator: zhangsunny77@hotmail.com
text:
It's cause about 1 hour block. I think the SMTPAppender should be work 
independently. If it really cause all Log objects suspend, maybe it should be 
fixed.

You can channel the SMTPAppender through an AsyncAppender, or of course 
customize the SMTPAppender, to work around this.  By itself, the SMTPAppender 
doesn't enforce any timing constraints and I think it's outside log4j's scope 
to worry about how your mail server admin has set up the server.
